block.p: Jasmine Ventura Ferrer, the daughter of Lourdes Ventura Ferrer and Dr. Juan C. Ferrer of Princeton Junction, N.J., is to be married today to Dr. Jason Daniel Matthews, the son of the late Anna Peacock Matthews and Dr. H. Allen Matthews Jr. The Rev. Patrick Connor, a Roman Catholic priest, is to officiate at the Princeton University Chapel.
The bride, 30, is a candidate for a doctorate in pharmacology at Columbia University, from which the bridegroom, 32, received a medical degree last week.

Jasmine Ventura Ferrer, the daughter of Lourdes Ventura Ferrer and Dr. Juan C. Ferrer of Princeton Junction, N.J., is to be married today to Dr. Jason Daniel Matthews, the son of the late Anna Peacock Matthews and Dr. H. Allen Matthews Jr. The Rev. Patrick Connor, a Roman Catholic priest, is to officiate at the Princeton University Chapel.
The bride, 30, is a candidate for a doctorate in pharmacology at Columbia University, from which the bridegroom, 32, received a medical degree last week.

Ms. Ferrer, who is keeping her name, graduated from Georgetown University and received a master's degree in public health from Columbia. Her mother is a cataloger at the Firestone Library at Princeton University. Her father investigates technology licensing opportunities for the intellectual property group at AT&T Shannon Laboratories in Florham Park, N.J.

The bridegroom, a cum laude graduate of Princeton, will begin a residency in internal medicine at New York University Medical Center in July. His father was a radiologist at Richland Memorial Hospital in Columbia, S.C.
